trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for a user interface to select and edit a connection string property at design time.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma classe base para uma interface de utilizador selecionar e editar uma propriedade de cadeia de ligação no momento da concepção.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the ConnectionStringEditor class is a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor> object that can be used at design time to select and edit a connection string expression and to assign the expression to a control property.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância da classe ConnectionStringEditor é um <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor>objetos que podem ser utilizados no momento da conceção para selecionar e editar uma expressão de cadeia de ligação e atribuir a expressão para uma propriedade de controlo.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control uses the ConnectionStringEditor class at design time to set the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConnectionString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>controlo utiliza a classe de ConnectionStringEditor no momento da conceção para definir o valor da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConnectionString%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConnectionString%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute> attribute to associate the ConnectionStringEditor with a property.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute>atributo para associar o ConnectionStringEditor com uma propriedade.</xref:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute>

trans-unit.source: When the associated property is edited on the design surface, the designer host calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor.EditValue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Quando a propriedade associada é editada na superfície do design, o anfitrião estruturador chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor.EditValue%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor.EditValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor.EditValue%2A> method displays a user interface for building the connection string expression and returns the connection string that is selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor.EditValue%2A>método apresenta uma interface de utilizador para construir a expressão de cadeia de ligação e devolve a cadeia de ligação que está selecionada pelo utilizador.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor.EditValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor.GetEditStyle%2A> method indicates the display style of the user interface.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor.GetEditStyle%2A>método indica o estilo de apresentação da interface de utilizador.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor.GetEditStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Edits the value of the specified object by using the specified service provider and context.
trans-unit.target: Edita o valor do objeto especificado utilizando o fornecedor de serviço especificado e o contexto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor.EditValue%2A> method starts the user interface for editing the `value` object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor.EditValue%2A>método inicia a interface de utilizador para editar o `value` objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor.EditValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The designer host calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor.EditValue%2A> method when you edit the value of a property that the connection string editor is associated with.
trans-unit.target: As chamadas de anfitrião estruturador o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor.EditValue%2A>método ao editar o valor de uma propriedade que se encontra associado o editor de cadeia de ligação.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor.EditValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The input service provider is used to obtain any editing services that are required within the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor.EditValue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O fornecedor de serviços de entrada é utilizado para obter todos os serviços edição que são necessários dentro de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor.EditValue%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor.EditValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: If an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment> service implementation is supported in the specified context, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor.EditValue%2A> method initializes a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox> control, which prompts you to select an existing connection expression or build a new connection expression.
trans-unit.target: Se um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment>implementação de serviço é suportada no contexto especificado, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor.EditValue%2A>método inicializa um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox>controlo, que pede-lhe para selecionar uma expressão de ligação existente ou criar uma nova expressão de ligação.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor.EditValue%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment>

trans-unit.source: If an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment> service implementation is not supported in the specified context, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor.EditValue%2A> method displays a simple instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class, which prompts you to enter the connection expression string.
trans-unit.target: Se um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment>implementação de serviço não é suportada no contexto especificado, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor.EditValue%2A>método apresenta uma instância do simple a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>classe, que pede-lhe para introduzir a cadeia da expressão de ligação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor.EditValue%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment>

trans-unit.source: If you cancel without selecting a connection expression string, the returned object is the same as the `value` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Se cancelar sem selecionar uma cadeia de expressão de ligação, o objeto devolvido é igual a `value` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> to use to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> a utilizar para obter informações de contexto adicional.

trans-unit.source: A service provider object through which to obtain editing services.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto de fornecedor de serviço através do qual pode obter os serviços de edição.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the object being edited.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância do objeto que está a ser editado.

trans-unit.source: The selected connection expression, as a string object; otherwise, if a connection expression was not selected, the same value that was passed in.
trans-unit.target: A expressão de ligação selecionada, como um objeto string; caso contrário, se uma expressão de ligação não foi selecionada, o mesmo value transmitido.

trans-unit.source: Returns the editing style that is associated with the connection string editor for the specified context.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o estilo de edição que estão associado com o editor de cadeia de ligação para o contexto especificado.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor.GetEditStyle%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor> class returns the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle> value.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor.GetEditStyle%2A>método o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor>classe devolve o <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle>valor.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor.GetEditStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment> service implementation is supported in the specified context, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor.GetEditStyle%2A> method returns the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle> value.
trans-unit.target: Se um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment>implementação de serviço é suportada no contexto especificado, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor.GetEditStyle%2A>método devolve o <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle>valor.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor.GetEditStyle%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor.GetEditStyle%2A> method is not supported in the specified context, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor.GetEditStyle%2A> method returns the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle> value.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor.GetEditStyle%2A>método não é suportado no contexto especificado, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor.GetEditStyle%2A>método devolve o <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle>valor.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor.GetEditStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor.GetEditStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> to use to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> a utilizar para obter informações de contexto adicional.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle"></xref> enumeration value that indicates the editing style for the provided user interface.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle"> </xref> valor de enumeração que indica a edição de estilo para a interface de utilizador fornecido.

trans-unit.source: Returns the provider name for the provided instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o nome do fornecedor para a instância indicada do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The GetProviderName method gets the provider name for the current instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor> class.
trans-unit.target: O método GetProviderName obtém o nome do fornecedor para a instância atual de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor>

trans-unit.source: For example, in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceConnectionStringEditor> class, which is derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor> class, the GetProviderName method returns the provider name.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, no <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceConnectionStringEditor>classe que deriva de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor>classe, o método de GetProviderName devolve o nome do fornecedor.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceConnectionStringEditor>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor"></xref> or an instance of a derived class.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor"> </xref> ou uma instância de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: Always an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Sempre uma cadeia vazia ("").

trans-unit.source: Puts the provider name on the specified instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Coloca o nome do fornecedor na instância especificada do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The SetProviderName method sets the provider name on the `instance` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O método SetProviderName define o nome do fornecedor do `instance` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: For example, in the `SqlDataSourceConnectionStringEditor`, which derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor> class, this either sets the provider name or adds an <xref:System.Web.UI.ExpressionBinding> object, if the connection is a configured connection.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, no `SqlDataSourceConnectionStringEditor`, que deriva do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor>classe, este define o nome do fornecedor ou adiciona um <xref:System.Web.UI.ExpressionBinding>objeto, se a ligação é uma ligação configurada.</xref:System.Web.UI.ExpressionBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor>

trans-unit.source: In this implementation, the SetProviderName method does nothing.
trans-unit.target: Nesta implementação, o método SetProviderName não produz qualquer efeito.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor"></xref> or an instance of a derived class.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ConnectionStringEditor"> </xref> ou uma instância de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection"></xref>.
